author: FreeSpinner
name: McSync
short: Syncs Minecraft usernames with Discord and rewards players via RCON.
description: A Redbot cog that allows users to sync their Minecraft username with their Discord account using a two-step authentication code process, and rewards them via RCON commands.
install_msg: Thank you for installing McSync! Use `[p]sync` to link a Minecraft account and `[p]rcon set` to configure RCON.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord user IDs and linked Minecraft usernames for sync functionality.
